collection:
In this Privacy Policy, we've
provided detailed information on when and why we collect personal information,
how we use it, and how we keep it secure.

## Information Collection

We collect information to provide better services to our users.

This includes
basic information such as your name, email address, and any other information
you choose to provide us.

We only collect information relevant to providing
and improving our services.

We employ various measures to protect
the information we collect and maintain its confidentiality.
sharing:
We do not and will not sell, rent, or trade email
lists with other companies and businesses for marketing purposes.
